Human.name: Human
Human.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races.

Elf.name: Elf
Elf.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.
traits: +2 racial bonus on saves against enchantment spells
+2 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks

Dwarf.name: Dwarf
Dwarf.description: Dwarves are known for their skill in warfare, their ability to withstand physical and magical punishment, their hard work, and their capacity for drinking ale.
traits: +2 racial bonus on saves against poison
+2 racial bonus on saves against spells and spell-like effects
+1 racial bonus on attack rolls against orcs and goblinoids

Halfling.name: Halfling
Halfling.description: Halflings are clever, capable, and resourceful survivors.
traits: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, Listen, and Move Silently checks
+1 racial bonus on all saving throws
+2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear
+1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings
